title: What do you at EC?
description: It is a 3-day conference which provides engineering students a hands-on experience to solve contemporary problems through education, collaboration, and debate while investing in sustainable solutions.

title: Are there any participation fees?
description: Engineering Conference 2019 participation fee is $25 per participant for all three days. UCI Engineering Conference is a non-profit event for which all proceeds go to funding under-resourced community development programs.

title: How can I register?
description: Registration for Engineering Conference 2019 is coming up! Join our mailing list for the latest updates in the meantime!

title: Where will the Engineering Conference be located?
description: Engineering Conference 2019 will be held on the University of California - Irvine Campus.

title: Is the conference restricted to student of a specific grade and major?
description: Not at all, we are glad to welcome all undergraduate UCI students.
